name: Hiran Chatterjee
content:
Hiraan Chatterjee[2] is an Indian Bengali film actor since 2007.[3][4][5] He also works with the non-governmental organisation, Voice of World, which provides aid to visually and physically-challenged street children.[6]
 Chatterjee[7] was a resident of Uluberia,[8] a sub-divisional town of Howrah, where he has spent his childhood.[9]
tags: Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from West Bengal
CS1 maint: archived copy as title
raw:
Indian film actor and singer


Hiraan ChatterjeeOccupationActorYears active2007–presentPolitical partyBharatiya Janata Party (2021–present)[1]Websitewww.hiraanchatterjee.com
Hiraan Chatterjee[2] is an Indian Bengali film actor since 2007.[3][4][5] He also works with the non-governmental organisation, Voice of World, which provides aid to visually and physically-challenged street children.[6]

Contents

1 Early life and education
2 Awards
3 Filmography

3.1 Upcoming films


4 References
5 External links


Early life and education[edit]
Chatterjee[7] was a resident of Uluberia,[8] a sub-divisional town of Howrah, where he has spent his childhood.[9]

Awards[edit]
Best Action Hero Award from Anandalok[10] for Nabab Nandini in 2008
